summary: Frontend testing for Virtual Pet enhancements (sounds, animations, playstore assets). Full testing of authenticated Virtual Pet page not possible due to Google OAuth requirement. Code review confirms all features are properly implemented. Playstore assets verified accessible at public URLs.

issues: Contains placeholder text 'App Name' - may need to be updated with actual app name 'CanineCompass' or 'Pet Token World'

details.enhanced_svg_dog: AnimatedK9Pet component with tail wagging, eye blinking, tongue out, ear perk animations
details.sound_toggle_button: Present at data-testid='sound-toggle-btn' with Volume2/VolumeX icons
details.soundManager_integration: 30 soundManager calls covering bark, whimper, pant, growl, reward, ballBounce, splash, footsteps, snore

sound_types: bark (normal, happy, excited, sleepy, eating, short)

training_with_sounds.behavior: bark(normal) on start, reward() + bark(happy) on success, whimper() on failure

authentication_status.google_oauth: Required for Virtual Pet page access
authentication_status.protected_route: Working - redirects to landing page when unauthenticated
authentication_status.limitation: Cannot test interactive Virtual Pet features without Google OAuth authentication

code_quality_review.javascript_lint: PASSED - No ESLint errors in VirtualPet.jsx or soundManager.js

action_items: MINOR: Update 'App Name' placeholder in feature_graphic.png with actual app name if needed for Play Store submission
critical_code_review_comments: soundManager.js uses Web Audio API correctly with proper error handling for unsupported browsers
All pet activities properly integrate with sound effects based on action type
CSS animations defined in both index.css and tailwind.config.js - no conflicts
VirtualPet component has proper data-testid attributes for core interactive elements
Protected route correctly requires authentication before showing Virtual Pet content

success_rate.frontend: 100% for verifiable features (code review, assets, landing page)

test_credentials.note: Google OAuth required - cannot create test credentials for automated testing

context_for_next_testing_agent: Virtual Pet enhancements verified via code review. The page at /pet requires Google OAuth. Sound features use Web Audio API via soundManager.js singleton. All 4 playstore assets are publicly accessible at /playstore-assets/. The feature_graphic.png has an 'App Name' placeholder that may need updating. Animations are defined in index.css with keyframes for wiggle, float, twinkle, etc.
